name: BONK
description: The rowdiest dog faction in the wasteland. BONK Raiders roam the highways looking for trouble.
lore: Legends say BONK Raiders were once courier dogs who mutated into fearless wasteland warriors.

name: Dogwifhat
description: A mysterious traveler wearing a hat. Followers of WIF believe the hat holds ancient power.
lore: Some say the hat is older than the wasteland itself. Others say it whispers coordinates.

name: Shiba Inu
description: A loyal nomadic clan wandering the wasteland. Known for honor, trade, and fierce protection.
lore: Shiba caravans travel between settlements, offering rare goods and ancient wisdom.

name: PEPE
description: A chaotic meme cult that leaves strange caches hidden across the wasteland.
lore: Pepe shrines appear overnight. No one knows who builds them, or why.

name: FLOKI
description: Viking‑coded explorers who believe the wasteland is theirs to conquer.
lore: The Floki clans carve runes into the ruins of old cities, marking territory and prophecy.

name: USDC
description: Stable currency used by caravans and traders across the wasteland.
lore: Caravans trust USDC because it never mutates, never fluctuates, and never lies.

name: Solana
description: The lifeblood of all wasteland tech. Everything runs on SOL.
lore: Ancient terminals still hum with Solana energy, long after the old world fell.

name: DEGEN
description: A tribe of Base‑born gamblers who believe luck is a weapon.
lore: DEGEN wanderers flip coins to decide the fate of entire settlements.
